articles.title: Eid-ul-Adha 2023 moon sighting LIVE: Muslims in India look for Dhul Hijjah moon - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Eid-ul-Adha 2023 moon sighting LIVE: Muslims in India, Pakistan, Australia, New Zealand etc look for Dhul Hijjah crescent; will celebrate Bakrid on this date
articles.content: The sighting of the Dhul Hijjah crescent moon in India, Pakistan, Australia, New Zealand and other countries, is crucial for determining the start of the Islamic month of Dhul Hijjah, which is the tw… [+5691 chars]
